items.name: Irina
items.desc: I’m in love with this dress! The classic black design is both timeless and sophisticated. It hugs my body perfectly and the material feels like something from a high-end boutique. I wore it to a formal dinner and felt like a movie star. Would 100% recommend!

items.name: Janny
items.desc: Such a romantic and dreamy dress. The soft pink shade is gorgeous, and the flowing fabric makes it so comfortable to wear. I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments. It’s feminine, elegant, and very well made.
